title: US to Cut Tariffs on Imported Pasta, Italy Foreign Ministry Says
description: The US decided to reduce controversial anti-dumping tariffs on some Italian pasta brands, Italy’s Foreign Ministry said.
content: The US decided to reduce controversial anti-dumping tariffs on some Italian pasta brands, Italy’s Foreign Ministry said.
